head-meta-descr: I would like to introduce my CV for the position of a Junior Frontend Developer
aside-hobbies-content-4: Listen to music and sing karaoke
aside-languages-content-ru-content: Mother tongue. I have an excellent oral and written speech.
aside-languages-content-en-content: Upper intermediate level. I have experience in reading scientific and technical literature in English.
main-about-content: Web development has been my hobby for many years. Now I decided to turn the hobby into a profession that would inspire me and bring income. I put the quality of the result in the first place. A visual component of work is important to me, so I especially like the Frontend development.
main-hardskills-content-1: I know how to make up on HTML5 using semantic tags
main-hardskills-content-2: I know how to provide cross browser layout with CSS3.
main-hardskills-content-3: I am skilled in Flexbox, CSS-grid, and Bootstrap technologies.
main-hardskills-content-4: I am skilled in JavaScript frontend libraries.
main-hardskills-content-5: I am able to create web animations with CSS and/or JS (requestAnimationFrame, GSAP)
main-hardskills-content-6: I know the ways to improve page loading speed
main-hardskills-content-7: I have experience with streaming build systems (Gulp).
main-hardskills-content-8: I have an understanding of JS frameworks (React, Vue).
main-hardskills-content-9: I have experience with version control software (Git).
main-education-content-1-h4-sub: basic and advanced web layout, JavaScript and Git
main-experience-content-1-h3-sub: The company specializes in the supply of laboratory equipment.
main-experience-content-1-h4-2-sub: In addition to the common tasks of a sales manager, my responsibilities included: improving and filling the corporate website, setting up web analytics platform, making presentations, and translating documents from English.
main-experience-content-2-h3-sub: One of the major research and educational units of the Lomonosov Moscow State University
main-experience-content-2-h4-2-sub: Scientific research in the field of biochemistry, performing in silico calculations (simulation of molecular dynamics and molecular docking), and working with scientific literature in English.
